name: Party Business Supreme
description:
You are a cake working for Party Business Inc.

Collect presents for the big client. Avoid forks that try to eat you, because you are a cake. Once you have collected the presents, you must deliver them to the big client.

Your boss, Mr. Business, will evaluate your performance.

Play on three distinct maps, each having three game modes: vanilla, survival, and a special mode for each map. Use keyboard or joystick to move around the map and collect presents while avoiding forks.
